name: Alexandros Strambopoulos
story: Argyris Moritiadou has been with the OPFOR for several years now and has proven himself to be a skilled and dedicated soldier. He takes his role as a team leader seriously and strives to lead his team to victory. Outside of his duties, he enjoys spending time with his wife and family in their small village in Greece. Argyris has a strong sense of loyalty, both to his country and his comrades, and will do whatever it takes to protect them.
